Class Player

java.lang.Object
  Player

public class Player
extends Object

A class to build the player for each game.

Version:
0.0.1a
Author:
JCBoysha & e-waste

Determines and sets the max characteristics of character

Parameters:
level - The level of the player. Should always be a positive integer.
